name: Broken (Seth)
description:
Help guide a broken light bulb to safety.

Use the light from your companion to guide the broken light to the exit door.

CREDITS

>https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7n8amCQirZr18AYm_TGRfQ Maker provided the 3D models and designs.

>http://youtube.com/FlareSFM Flare composed the music.

Please check out their Youtube channels.
